been.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: used to say that someone has gone to a place and come back
been.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Have you been to see the Van Gogh exhibition yet?
been.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: used to say that someone has come to a place and left again
been.translation[0].note_box[0].items[0]: You use have been to when someone has visited a place and come back again
She’s been to the hospital for a check-up
been.translation[0].note_box[0].items[1]: You use have been in when someone has lived or stayed in the same place
How long have you been in London?
been.translation[0].note_box[0].items[2]: You use have gone to when someone has travelled to a place and not come back
Mark’s not here He’s gone to the shops
been.translation[0].note_box[0].items[3]: You use went to to talk about a trip that someone made in the past
Last May I went to a conference in Montreal
